class.name: AdjLinearSolverQr

javadoc.text: A solver for QR decomposition that can efficiently modify the previous decomposition when * data is added or removed.
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

method.name: setMaxSize
method.comment: allow it some room to grow

javadoc.text: Compute the A matrix from the Q and R matrices.

method.name: addRowToA
method.comment: see if it needs to grow the data structures
